participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and adventurous, Emily thrives on challenges both on and off the tennis court.
participant_1.background: i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Curious and thoughtful, Jacob loves exploring new ideas and sharing knowledge with others.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.

content.text: Where from the book I issue?
